text:
@MattHancock Is this serious ? 
R apparently rising - mayhem on the M3. Track & trace a mess a data gathering, oh sorry, a COVID-19 tracking app that doesn’t work. Government advisors not only breaking lockdown but breaking the code of conduct with impunity... And you now say it’s safe ??!
